sentences.sContent: We support the call for the enactment of a Bill of Rights.
sentences.sCn: 我们支持《权利法案》制定的呼吁。

remMethod.val: en(进入) + act(行动) + ment → 制订行动计划 → 颁布

trans.tranCn: 制订， 颁布； 法律， 法规
trans.tranOther: The enactment of a law is the process in a legislature by which the law is agreed upon and made official
